Jonah or Jonas__01.2__Ninive: : The capital city of the Assyrian empire.
Jonah or Jonas__01.3__Tharsis: : Which some take to be Tharsus of Cilicia, others to be Tartessus of Spain, others to be Carthage.
Jonah or Jonas__01.5__A deep sleep: : This is a lively image of the insensibility of sinners, fleeing from God, and threatened on every side with his judgments: and yet sleeping as if they were secure.
